data_structures: 2D prefix sum array for counting occupied cells within stamp areas
2D prefix sum array for counting valid stamp placements
algorithm_technique: 2D prefix sums to efficiently count occupied cells and valid stamp placements within potential stamp areas.
problem_summary_simple: Determine if all empty cells in a grid can be covered by stamps without covering occupied cells.
problem_summary_technical: Use 2D prefix sums to check if each empty cell can be covered by at least one valid stamp placement.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into two main checks: 1. Can a stamp fit entirely within the grid and not cover any occupied cells? 2. Can every empty cell be covered by at least one such valid stamp?
2D prefix sums are crucial for efficiently querying the number of occupied cells within any rectangular subgrid (potential stamp area).
A second 2D prefix sum can track where valid stamps can be placed, allowing for efficient checking if all empty cells are covered.
